```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(tidytext)
library(gutenbergr)

hound <- gutenberg_download(2852)
hound <- hound |>
    unnest_tokens(word, text) |>
    anti_join(stop_words)

counts <- hound |>
    count(word, sort = TRUE) |>
    filter(n > 75)

counts <- counts |>
    mutate(word = fct_reorder(word, n))

counts |> ggplot(aes(n, word)) + geom_col() + labs(y = NULL)
```
